      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.reflect.Field,​java.util.List<A>> lookupAnnotatedElements​(java.lang.Object controller)
      Overriding methods need to return a map, where the key is the annotated element (e.g. field, method) and the value is a list of (potentially repeatable) annotations.

    • Method Detail

      • lookupAnnotatedElements

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.reflect.Field,​java.util.List<A>> lookupAnnotatedElements​(java.lang.Object controller)
        Description copied from class: AbstractAnnotationBasedControllerExtension
        Overriding methods need to return a map, where the key is the annotated element (e.g. field, method) and the value is a list of (potentially repeatable) annotations. In case the annotation is not repeatable, than e list with size 1 is returned, containing the single annotation.
        Specified by:
        lookupAnnotatedElements in class AbstractAnnotationBasedControllerExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation,​java.lang.reflect.Field>
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller instance to extend
        Returns:
        the map of annotated elements and their corresponding annotations (potentially repeatable)

      • getFieldValue

        protected <T> T getFieldValue​(java.lang.Object instance,
                              java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                              java.lang.Class<T> expectedType)
        Retrieves the field value from field inside the supplied instance. It is required that the retrieved value is not null and is of type expectedType.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance to retrieve the field value from
        field - the field
        expectedType - the expected type
        Returns:
        the field value of type expectedType, never null
